definitions: (with reference to a disturbing or unpleasant interest or activity) in an abnormal and unhealthy manner

examples.text: a girl who morbidly wears her dead mother's clothes
a rich recluse morbidly obsessed with the past

shortDefinitions: (with reference to disturbing or unpleasant interest or activity) in abnormal and unhealthy manner

definitions: in a way that relates to or is indicative of disease
shortDefinitions: in way that relates to or is indicative of disease
